sense.def:
Self-defence
je uporaba sile ali posebnih telesnih spretnosti, da se zavarujemo pred nekom, ki nas napade.

seg.quote: He had struck her in self-defence.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj rečemo
in self-defence
, navedemo vzroke za svoje ravnanje nekomu, ki misli, da nismo ravnali prav.

seg.quote: ‘I didn't want to go anyway,’ he grumbled in self-defence.
